about_the_game:
The Sqube universe continues to grow with new excitement.

Following the success of "Sqube Darkness," the Sqube universe expands with the new spin-off game "Sqube Escape." Are you ready to discover the adventures of the Sqube character?

Story

The Lord of Eyes has plunged all the inhabitants of the Sqube world into darkness by shattering the white crystal, the light source of the Sqube world. You must gather the light stones, divided into 3 primary colors, to reconstruct the white crystal. While doing this, you must pass through 60 levels ranging from easy to hard, defeat bosses, and reach the finale. Each level will present new challenges and obstacles, ensuring that your journey is always exciting and varied. Finding hidden Easter eggs scattered throughout the levels will add extra fun to your gameplay.


Gameplay Features:

- Cleverly and Enjoyably Designed Levels: Navigate through 60 uniquely designed levels filled with new obstacles and enemies.
- Various Difficulty Levels: Play the game with four difficulty levels—Easy, Normal, Hard, and Pro—catering to players of all ages. Challenge yourself to complete the game at higher difficulty levels.
- Reflex and Platform Action: Levels are designed in an action-platform style, testing your reflexes.
- Boss Battles: Fight challenging bosses that will test your skills.
- Extras: Use camouflage, utilize helper tools when in trouble, collect gold coins, and increase your life count with the collected coins.


Controls

Customizable keyboard controls.


Design and Graphics:

- Atmosphere: Colors, effects, and enemy characters that suit the story of the game.
- Immersive Music: Sounds and music that complement and enhance the gameplay.


Localization:

The game supports nearly 20 languages, ensuring a smooth experience for players around the world.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz (Apple M1, Intel Core i5)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 2.4 GHz (Apple M1 or Intel Core i5)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: Sqube Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: A unique action-platformer game set in the Sqube universe. Challenge yourself through 60 levels filled with obstacles and bosses. Choose from four difficulty levels and enjoy immersive graphics and sound.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Czech, Malay
